des: "I got this recipe from a former co-worker.  It is the best dip for fresh fruit I have ever tasted. Slivered almonds are blended into a sweet, thick mixture of pure, creamy goodness.         "
ins: In a medium bowl, mix the sour cream, sugar and salt. Fold in the almonds and whipped cream. Chill in the refrigerator 1 hour or longer before serving.
